Summary:
Electronics Engineer from the National University of Córdoba, Argentina. Space Science Master's degree Student at Brazil's National Institute for Space Research (INPE), developing an intense thunderstorm nowcasting software to identify the most electrically active regions, and a motion detection software to capture upper atmospheric phenomena.
Specialized in programming with Python and, hopefully, a future data scientist. Currently located in Salta, Argentina, learning React to seek a position as a Front-end web developer.
